entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
